name: Ffmpeg setup
body:
### Ffmpeg Ubuntu Setup Script
Hai, this is a simple script to automate the installation of ffmpeg on ubuntu.

### Using the script

Do you trust us?
    curl -L https://raw.github.com/devthenet/ffmpeg_setup/master/ubuntu_ffmpeg_setup | sh

### Sources
* http://stackoverflow.com/questions/5487085/ffmpeg-covert-html-5-video-not-working
* http://johndyer.name/ffmpeg-settings-for-html5-codecs-h264mp4-theoraogg-vp8webm/
* http://rodrigopolo.com/ffmpeg/cheats.html



### Author
#### Peter Garbers
* https://github.com/petergarbers
* http://twitter.com/petergarbers
